title: VTEX Headless CMS previews are now private by default
description: In order to access CMS previews, users will need to authenticate to the myvtex.com domain of their accounts.

title: Base Store repository name changed
description: The Base Store repository compatible with Gatsby was renamed due to the launch of the Base Store (Next.js).

title: Base Store (Next.js) starter available.
description: Choose your favorite framework: Gatsby or Next.js! The Base Store is now fully compatible with Next.js.

title: WebOps updated to use Lighthouse 9
description: The WebOps pipeline has been updated to use the newest Lighthouse version. As a result, newer audit reports may slightly differ from those previously issued.
